articles.author: Kevin Liptak and Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Trump says he believes Putin's election meddling denials
articles.description: President Donald Trump suggested on Saturday he's done confronting Russian President Vladimir Putin over his country's election meddling since it's insulting to the Russian leader.

articles.title: Trump: I believe Putin - CNN Video
articles.description: President Trump told reporters that he discussed Russia meddling in the 2016 election at the APEC summit with Vladimir Putin saying, "Every time he sees me he says I didn't do that. I really believe when he tells me that he means it. But he says I didn't do that."

articles.author: Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Trump, Putin issue joint statement on fighting ISIS in Syria
articles.description: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin informally met on the sidelines of a regional economic summit in Vietnam Saturday and agreed to an extensive statement on the conflict in Syria.

articles.author: Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: North Korea: Trump 'begged for nuclear war' during Asia trip
articles.description: North Korea lashed out at US President Donald Trump again Saturday, describing him as a "destroyer" who "begged for nuclear war" during his tour of Asia.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN White House Producer
articles.title: Trump's abroad but the headlines are at home
articles.description: When President Donald Trump awoke on his first day in Asia to news that a gunman had massacred more than two dozen people at a church in Texas, it presaged a week of events back home that -- in a well-worn pattern -- have overshadowed his attempts at diplomacy abroad.

articles.author: Moni Basu, CNN
articles.title: A Muslim American's Veterans Day message
articles.description: Two defiant minutes at the Democratic National Convention turned Gold Star father Khizr Khan into an unwitting celebrity. Now he takes his message across America.

articles.title: Fighting terror. Giving back. A sense of duty.
articles.description: CNN asked 14 U.S. active duty military members and veterans to describe the first time they felt the call to serve and protect in the armed forces. Share your own story with #iwantedtoserve

articles.author: Sophie Tatum
articles.title: McConnell to NYT: I 'misspoke' on tax increase for middle class
articles.description: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said Friday that he "misspoke" when he  previously said nobody in the middle class would get a tax increase under the new GOP plan, according to The New York Times.

articles.title: GOP official: Moore accusations are gossip - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Chairman of the Alabama Republican Party Marty Connors discusses the accusations against Roy Moore involving a 14-year-old girl. Moore has denied the accusations.

articles.author: Miranda Green, CNN
articles.title: WSJ: Mueller probes Flynn role in plot to deliver cleric to Turkey
articles.description: Former White House national security adviser Mike Flynn and his son are alleged to have been offered as much as $15 million to forcibly remove from the US a Muslim cleric wanted by Turkey, The Wall Street Journal reports.
